com.thorgaming.throwme.displayobjects.game
Class HUD

java.lang.Object
  com.thorgaming.throwme.displayobjects.DispObj
      com.thorgaming.throwme.displayobjects.game.HUD

public class HUD
extends DispObj

Contains the objects displayed on the screen while the game is being played to inform the user about progress

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Cheyney
